Articles.Content:
Have any of you noticed getting a null reference whenever trying to double symmetry any part. Initially, I had this problem with B9 aerospace, specifically it's jet engines (CF34 and TE turbojet), but quickly exploded into the stock parts. The Stock parts just get NullReferenceException, and that's it.

http://imgur.com/a/0NkuB

Do you have tweak scale installed?

I had this issue with any part that had an air intake on it, for some reason it would start spamming NREs when trying to symmetry them.

I ended up removing most of the tweak scale configs and only left the ones in for like KW and any mod that comes with their own config.
